programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Headbutts and aggression abound during a jail fight. A young man is arrested after stealing $1,500 worth of hats. Officers discover a suicidal inmate who’s no longer taking his medication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Boisterous inmates are placed in restraints after initiating several verbal altercations. A woman struggles with substance abuse following the death of her fianc̩, and two young escorts discuss their "observing" strategy when casino hopping.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A secret stash is uncovered during a search at a suspect's property. Two rowdy inmates don't quite hit it off when they invade each other's personal space, and a jaywalker experiences problems keeping his pants from falling down.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A young father pulls a desperate double robbery to make ends meet. A routine shakedown gets deadly when officers uncover alarming contraband. An inmate plays innocent about her criminal past until confronted by officers. An antsy woman’s brazen behavior tests the patience of officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After falling down a flight of stairs while drunk, a young man is amazed he is in jail for refusing to go to the hospital. A correction officer tries to explain to a young man why carrying a gun-shaped knife is not a good idea. An expectant father is arrested after a gin-fueled rampage at his parent's house and misses the birth of his first child. A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A singer in custody performs for the officers. A woman is charged with burglary, and officers see right through a young woman's tears.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prostitute gets busted on a slow work day. An intoxicated inmate tangles with guards, and an angry woman has cross words for a guard.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tempers flare up when two agitated inmates share a cell. An intoxicated woman gives officers a hard time in booking, and a hustler facing DUI charges wants to change his ways.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man tests officers' patience. A woman tries to deceive police with multiple identities. A one-legged biker shows off his balancing skills to officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A testy man is sent to the isolation cell to "cool off." A teary-eyed young man maintains his innocence. An inmate may have ingested contraband to avoid possession charges.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Year's Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative inmate complicates things. A man charged with DUI complains about the prison food. A security guard arrested for robbery fears that her dream job with Homeland Security is gone.

programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.

programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.desc: A woman is brought into the detention center hogtied. A disruptive teen is sent to a holding cell. Casino valets tip the authorities about an intoxicated woman leaving behind the wheel.

programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.desc: A code red call blares after a fight occurs in the jail’s dorms. Accused of trespassing, a woman removes her clothes from her holding cell. A man is brought into detox after slamming against a cop car.

programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge.
